citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on
24-Apr-17.
Knocked on the door of the facility . Called and left a message on the business answering machine.
